intro.title: Exoxe Exosome in Israel
intro.text: MitoDerm combines advanced aesthetic technology with science to bring innovative solutions to the field of aesthetics. Are you a doctor or cosmetologist looking to enhance your services? Let's innovate together!

about.text1: Exosomes have gained attention in the field of aesthetics due to their potential for
about.text1Colored: skin rejuvenation, anti-aging effects, and breakthroughs in treating acne scars and hair loss.
about.text2: These exosomes are rich in growth factors, cytokines, and other bioactive molecules that have the potential to promote tissue regeneration, collagen synthesis, and provide a more radiant youthful appearance. Combined with
about.text2Colored: advanced technologies, exosomes offer innovative solutions for improving skin texture, reducing scarring, and revitalizing hair follicles.
about.itemExp4: Increase in intracellular collagen and hyaluronic acid.

item1.title: What are exosomes?
item1.text: Exosomes are tiny vesicles, rich in growth factors, proteins, and regenerative signals. These powerful messengers interact with your body’s cells, stimulating healing and rejuvenation.

item2.title: How do exosomes work?
item2.text: Exosomes deliver growth factors, proteins, and regenerative signals directly to your body's target cells. When applied to a treatment area, they communicate with these cells to promote repair, regeneration, and rejuvenation. By harnessing your body's natural healing processes, exosome therapy stimulates tissue renewal, boosts collagen production, and enhances overall cellular health. The result is significant improvement in the treated area—whether it's skin, hair or other specific regions.

item3.title: What conditions are helped by exosomes?
item3.text: At Mitoderm, our exosome therapy offers transformative solutions—including skin rejuvenation to enhance texture and reduce signs of aging; hair restoration to promote growth and address thinning hair; reduction of acne scars for smoother skin and post-procedure healing to accelerate recovery—all by unlocking your body’s natural ability to renew.

item1.name: Victoria Aslanyan
item1.text: As a doctor and clinic owner, I integrate advanced exosome treatments into my practice. The results are outstanding! My patients see smoother, rejuvenated skin, and the products have become a cornerstone of my clinic’s offerings. I’m definitely continuing with these treatments!"

item2.name: Gregory Dyachenko
item2.text: I had an amazing experience with the exosome treatment for hair thinning, and I want to thank Ilona especially. In just a few months, my hair has gone from thinning to fuller and healthier. I’m truly impressed with the transformation.

dream.textP1: Mitoderm fulfills its vision by focusing on the
dream.textP3: The company leads the field of science and beauty by providing innovative and effective solutions for professionals in the aesthetics field, taking them one step above the rest.
dream.textP4: Upgrade your clinic and offer your clients the most advanced treatments.
dream.textP5: Our commitment to quality and professionalism in a supportive environment empowers you, promotes your personal growth, and
dream.textP6: helps you excel at the professional level.
dream.textP7: At Mitoderm, we provide advanced solutions for skin rejuvenation, anti-aging, hair thinning, and other skin concerns, tailored to your unique needs. Be part of our family today!

accessibility.title: Accessibility Declaration for mitoderm.com and mitoderm.co.il
accessibility.websites: The websites mitoderm.com and mitoderm.co.il are committed to providing equal access to all digital services for people with disabilities in accordance with international accessibility standards. We are continuously working to improve the usability of our websites to make them accessible to a wide audience.
accessibility.interfaceText: The website is adapted following WCAG 2.1 guidelines (Levels A and AA), including:
accessibility.contrast: High-contrast design for visually impaired users.
accessibility.alt: Image descriptions using the ALT attribute.
accessibility.scaling: Easy font scaling and interface adjustments.
accessibility.difficulties: If you encounter difficulties using the mitoderm.com or mitoderm.co.il websites, please let us know:
accessibility.feedbackHelp: Your feedback helps us improve accessibility.
accessibility.obligationsText: This declaration is made in accordance with the legal requirements of Israel and international accessibility standards. It will be updated as website functionality changes.

item1.title: Welcome & Networking
item1.text: Meet industry colleagues, enjoy great food and fine wine.

item2.title: Behind-the-Scenes Story
item2.text: Ilona Shpektor, CEO of MitoDerm, will share her journey from nursing and cosmetics to leading an innovative company. She will give insights and practical tools to help you grow.

item3.title: Exclusive Product Reveal
item3.text: Discover a groundbreaking aesthetic product from Korea, sold in 35 countries worldwide, opening new opportunities in aesthetics.

item4.title: How to Grow Your Business with MitoDerm
item4.text: Learn how to use MitoDerm’s business model to take your business to the next level.

firstLook.subtitle: MITODERM Invites You to an Intimate and Inspiring Conference!
firstLook.text: MITODERM is a subsidiary of a global group specializing in the distribution of medical equipment and advanced aesthetic solutions in Asia, Australia, and the USA. Combining innovation, expertise, and years of experience, we are here to lead the next generation of professional aesthetics – now in Israel.

toTop.title: To top it off
toTop.text1: An exclusive offer: purchase the product at a special price before anyone else!
toTop.text2: A digital course on building a winning business – strategic tools for creating differentiation and increasing profitability in a competitive market
